name: GitLab Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 GitLab Tool 节点。主要用于: Retrieve data from GitLab API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Retrieve data from GitLab API | (必填项)

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: accessToken
available_options: Access Token (值: accessToken)
OAuth2 (值: oAuth2)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: issue
available_options: File (值: file)
Issue (值: issue)
Release (值: release)
Repository (值: repository)
User (值: user)
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Create (值: create) - Create a new file in repository
Delete (值: delete) - Delete a file in repository
Edit (值: edit) - Edit a file in repository
Get (值: get) - Get the data of a single file
List (值: list) - List contents of a folder
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

owner.name: owner
owner.description: User, group or namespace of the project
owner.natural_language_description: 参数名: Project Owner | 作用: User, group or namespace of the project | (必填项)

repository.name: repository
repository.natural_language_description: 参数名: Project Name | 作用: The name of the project | (必填项)

title.name: title
title.natural_language_description: 参数名: Title | 作用: The title of the issue | (必填项)

body.name: body
body.natural_language_description: 参数名: Body | 作用: The body of the comment

due_date.name: due_date
due_date.natural_language_description: 参数名: Due Date | 作用: Due Date for issue

labels.name: labels
labels.natural_language_description: 参数名: Labels | 默认值: {'label': ''}
available_options: label (值: None) - Label to add to issue

assignee_ids.name: assignee_ids
assignee_ids.natural_language_description: 参数名: Assignees | 默认值: {'assignee': ''}
available_options: assignee (值: None) - User ID to assign issue to

issueNumber.name: issueNumber
issueNumber.description: The number of the issue to lock
issueNumber.natural_language_description: 参数名: Issue Number | 作用: The number of the issue to lock | 默认值: 0 | (必填项)

editFields.name: editFields
editFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Edit Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: title (值: None) - The title of the issue
description (值: None) - The body of the issue
state (值: None) - The state to set
labels (值: None)
assignee_ids (值: None)
due_date (值: None) - Due Date for issue

lockReason.name: lockReason
lockReason.description: The reason to lock the issue
lockReason.natural_language_description: 参数名: Lock Reason | 作用: The reason to lock the issue | 默认值: resolved
available_options: Off-Topic (值: off-topic) - The issue is Off-Topic
Too Heated (值: too heated) - The discussion is too heated
Resolved (值: resolved) - The issue got resolved
Spam (值: spam) - The issue is spam

releaseTag.name: releaseTag
releaseTag.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tag | 作用: The tag of the release | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: name (值: None) - The release name
description (值: None) - The description of the release. You can use Markdown.
milestones (值: None) - The title of each milestone to associate with the release (provide a titles list spearated with comma)
released_at (值: None) - The date when the release is/was ready

projectId.name: projectId
projectId.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project
projectId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Project ID | 作用: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project | (必填项)

tag_name.name: tag_name
tag_name.description: The Git tag the release is associated with
tag_name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tag Name | 作用: The Git tag the release is associated with | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 20

getRepositoryIssuesFilters.name: getRepositoryIssuesFilters
getRepositoryIssuesFilters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: assignee_username (值: None) - Return only issues which are assigned to a specific user
author_username (值: None) - Return only issues which were created by a specific user
search (值: None) - Search issues against their title and description
labels (值: None) - Return only issues with the given labels. Multiple lables can be separated by comma.
updated_after (值: None) - Return only issues updated at or after this time
state (值: None) - The state to filter by
order_by (值: None) - The order the issues should be returned in
sort (值: None) - The sort order

filePath.name: filePath
filePath.description: The path of the folder to list
filePath.natural_language_description: 参数名: Path | 作用: The path of the folder to list

page.name: page
page.natural_language_description: 参数名: Page | 作用: Page of results to display | 默认值: 1

additionalParameters.name: additionalParameters
additionalParameters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Parameters | 作用: Additional fields to add | 默认值: {}
available_options: branchStart (值: None)
author (值: None)
encoding (值: None)

asBinaryProperty.name: asBinaryProperty
asBinaryProperty.description: Whether to set the data of the file as binary property instead of returning the raw API response
asBinaryProperty.natural_language_description: 参数名: As Binary Property | 作用: Whether to set the data of the file as binary property instead of returning the raw API response | 默认值: True

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Input Binary Field | 提示: The name of the input binary field containing the file to be written | 默认值: data | (必填项)

binaryData.name: binaryData
binaryData.description: Whether the data to upload should be taken from binary field
binaryData.natural_language_description: 参数名: Binary File | 作用: Whether the data to upload should be taken from binary field | 默认值: False | (必填项)

fileContent.name: fileContent
fileContent.description: The text content of the file
fileContent.natural_language_description: 参数名: File Content | 作用: The text content of the file | (必填项)

commitMessage.name: commitMessage
commitMessage.natural_language_description: 参数名: Commit Message | (必填项)

branch.name: branch
branch.description: Name of the new branch to create. The commit is added to this branch.
branch.natural_language_description: 参数名: Branch | 作用: Name of the new branch to create. The commit is added to this branch. | (必填项)
